name: Cheese Thief (Scinacz)
description:
Cheese Thief is an Among Us Inspired game, where one of the players gets picked to be the cheese thief and the other have to figure out who it is.

The game was made for the Multiplayer Game Jam, so its not fully complete.

Controls:
E - interact
TAB - unlock mouse
ESC - quit current game
ALT+ENTER - fullscreen

The game has 100% bugs.
Best expirience with Voice Chat (Discord, WhatsApp, etc.)

If you are the first player to join, wait for the other person to join and then quit out of the server, rejoin the game and then for some reason there is less bugs.
!DO THIS BEFORE STARTING THE GAME!
